attributes.action: Allow us our God-given rights as to where we can smoke without harming others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm aged 54 and a smoker.If stressed after visiting family in hospital, a smoke-in my car,away from others-hurts no-one but me.
I've attended post-mortems and seen the damage to the lungs from smoking-but it's my life, to live as I choose. I WILL NOT BE DICTATED TO!

rejection.details: There is no law to prevent you from me smoking in your car.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
